login.slogan: The best parking app ever made!
login.sub-slogan: With account automation features, cost and profit reports, cloud data backup, cross-platform support for Windows, Linux, Mac OS, customer receipt and ticket issuance, phone notifications for users, and many more functionalities.
login.welcome: The best parking app ever made!
login.register-sub-slogan: Welcome to our app! To start enjoying all the features and benefits, please complete the registration process on the right.
